GRAIN CLEAN
MV HUA YANG MEI GUI     29974 BLT 2011:   OPENING MUSCAT 7/12 SEPT
Type: Single Deck Bulk Carrier
Yard New Times S/Y, China
Year of Build Mar 2011
IMO No. 9497490

Flag PRC

Suez Net Tonnage (mts) 17045,25
Panama Net Tonnage (mts) 15644
Lightship (mts) 7789,1
Summer TPC 42,6
Holds/Hatches 5/5
Hatch Size H1: L14m x W14,4m, H2-5: L19,2m x W15,6m
Holds CO2 Fitted YES
Cranes 4x30 mts max S.W.L.
Speed & Consumption:
Laden Abt 12.0 knots on abt 19 mts VLSFO + abt 0.2 mts LSMGO
Ballast Abt 12.0 knots on abt 18 mts VLSFO + abt 0.2 mts LSMGO
In port idle Abt 1.9 mts VLSFO + abt 1.2 mts for boiler consumption + abt 0.2 mts LSMGO – CONFIRM BOILER CONS IS ALSO VLSFO
In port working Abt 4.5 mts VLSFO + abt 1.2 mts for boiler consumption + abt 0.2 mts LSMGO - CONFIRM BOILER CONS IS ALSO VLSFO
ADA & WOG
(THE TERM "ABT" MEANS +/-0.5 K FOR SPEED AND +/-5% FOR CONSUMPTION IN SHIP'S FAVOR)
FOR THE PURPOSES OF CALCULATING VESSEL PERFORMANCE UNDER THIS C/P, IT IS AGREED THAT GOOD WEATHER CONDITION IS BASIS EVEN KEEL, SMOOTH SEA, 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS (FROM NOON TO NOON) WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL. ALL DAYS WHERE THE WEATHER EXCEEDS BEAUFORT FORCE 4 (MAX 16 KNOTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (0.5 – 1.25M) AND/OR SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT UP TO 1.25 M AND/OR ADVERSE CURRENT AND NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL ARE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM CALCULATIONS. ALWAYS EXCLUDING PERIODS DURING WHICH REDUCTIONS OF SPEED FOR SAFETY, REDUCED VISIBILITY, STEAMING AND/OR MANEUVERING IN CONGESTED WATERS/STRAITS, IN/OUT PORTS ETC.
EXTRAPOLATION (THE “DIDYMI” METHODOLOGY) IS NOT ALLOWED, I.E. EXTRAPOLATION OF GOOD WEATHER PERFORMANCE ACROSS BAD WEATHER PERIODS (OR THE ENTIRE VOYAGE DISTANCE) IS NOT ALLOWED. POSITIVE / FAVOURABLE CURRENT DURING GOOD WEATHER PERIOD NOT TO BE DEDUCTED FROM VESSEL’S SPEED IN ASCERTAINING VESSEL’S PERFORMANCE SPEED.
Plsd to hear .
Kind Rgds /Thanos Sofras
As Agents Only
On Behalf Of Falcon Enterpises Inc .
END.
